description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Take Jimmy and burst zombies with your lazer gun, your fire gun, your plasma gun or your bazooka ! Roll on them with you car !  Put turrets and landmines to blast them and to protect your granny !  This Retro 2D game mixes Run & Gun, Tower Defence and Waves shooter. Playable solo, Co-op (local), and also versus (local) (Asymetric gaemplay) !
description.short: Take Jimmy and burst zombies with your lazer gun, your fire gun, your plasma gun or your bazooka ! Roll on them with you car !  Put turrets and landmines to blast them and to protect your granny !  This Retro 2D game mixes Run & Gun, Tower Defence and Waves shooter. Playable solo, Co-op (local), and also versus (local) (Asymetric gaemplay) !
